General.Name: Funeng Oriental Equipment Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Funeng Oriental Equipment Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells various machines used in printing, packaging, and equipment industries in China. It offers rotogravure printing machines for packaging and decorating paper, woodgrain paper, printing machine, and poly paper, as well as solvent-free gravure printing machines. The company also provides maintenance, professional, and technical solutions. The company was formerly known as Sotech Smarter Equipment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Funeng Oriental Equipment Technology Co., Ltd. in August 2020. Funeng Oriental Equipment Technology Co., Ltd. is based in Zhongshan, China.
General.Address: No. 35, Dongfu North Road, Zhongshan, China, 528427
